Speed.Description: Additional Flagella improve the cell's maximum speed

Toughness.Description: A thicker cell wall means this cell can take more damage

Agility.Description: Cillia on the sides of the cells increase their ability to turn and accelerate

Lifespan.Description: Adapt this cell to a longer lifespan

Mitosis Cost.Description: Additional centrosomes make it easier for this cell to reproduce

Surface Antigens.Description: Improved surface antigens cause more contact damage to other cells

Antibodies.Description: Stronger antibodies deal damage at a distance
